General.Name: Shaanxi Construction Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Construction Machinery Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and leasing of machinery in China and internationally. The company provides construction machinery, including tower cranes; road construction machinery; construction steel structures; and rental services. It also leases, assembles, disassembles, and maintains construction machinery equipment. In addition, it is involved in airport, municipal roads, road and bridge construction, and pavement construction engineering contracting business. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.

1.Name: Mr. Bai  Haihong
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
